description: Bring the flavours of butter chicken to your next barbecue with this nutritionally approved chicken skewer recipe. It's perfect for alfresco lunches and dinners.
name: Barbecued Butter Chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g skinless chicken breasts, cut into 3cm strips
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
2 cups cooked medium-grain brown rice, heated

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1/2 cup yoghurt and curry paste in a medium bowl. Add chicken and stir to coat. Thread chicken on 8 metal skewers, then place in a large dish. Refrigerate for 15 minutes to allow flavours to infuse.
Meanwhile, place carrot, onion and half of the mint in a medium bowl. Season with pepper. Drizzle over lemon juice and oil and toss to combine.
Roughly chop remaining mint leaves and place in a small bowl with cucumber, lemon zest, and remaining yoghurt. Season with pepper. Stir until well combined.
Preheat barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium heat. Cook skewers for 3 minutes on each side or until charred and cooked through. Serve skewers with rice, carrot salad and yoghurt mixture.
